ygData.subject: Re: All of the BlackSmithing Stuff!
ygData.msgSnippet: What I did first was to spend a few training points on it.  Then I sharpened rusty weapons until about level 25.  After that I started making studs.  That is
ygData.messageBody:
What I did first was to spend a few training points on it. Then I sharpened
rusty weapons until about level 25. After that I started making studs. That
is as far as I've gotten. I don't know about Qeynos, but I know you can buy
sharpening stones and ore in North Freeport at Groflah's Forge. Hope you find
this helpful.

Lanye
Wood Elf Bard
Fennin Ro
>===== Original Message From EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com =====
>From: "Andrew Whiteside" <andrew668@...>
>
>All I want to know is what goes into making your chances alot better, i.e.
>INT, STR, DEX, etc. Also what exactly should I do at each skill, 1-10,
>11-20, etc. Also how much should I spend and where I can buy all the
>materials. Right now I'm in Qeynos but I can get ore from a friend. I'm a
>level 13 Barbarian Warrior on the Bristlebain Server called Kinor, the next
>time I'll be on though is Saturday afternoon. So if anyone can reply to this
>and tell me as presise as you can to tell me what to do.
>
>Thanx so much,
>Kinor Level 13 Barbarian Warrior,
>Bristlebain Server
